extract_dominoes.py.description: Basic domino extraction using threshold=200 for detection, threshold=150 for pip counting. Hardcoded contour area bounds (10-200) for pip detection. No preprocessing currently applied.

preprocess.py.description: CLAHE preprocessing module created. Uses LAB color space (L-channel only) to enhance contrast without affecting color. Default params: clipLimit=2.0, tileGridSize=(8,8). Functions accept BGR numpy arrays and return BGR.
